result.execSummary:
Charge(s) in this case were read in to this or other case(s). A "read in" charge is a charge that is dismissed as part of a plea agreement, however:

  • The defendant agrees to have the court consider the charge(s) when sentencing for another crime, under Wis. Stats. 973.20(1g)(b); and
  • The defendant cannot be prosecuted for these charge(s) in the future.

Notice to employers: It may be a violation of state law to discriminate against a job applicant because of an arrest or conviction record. Generally speaking, an employer may refuse to hire an applicant on the basis of a conviction only if the circumstances of the conviction substantially relate to the particular job. For more information, see Wisconsin Statute 111.335 and the Department of Workforce Development's publication, Arrest and Conviction Records under the Law.
result.caption: State of Wisconsin vs. Jaquell D. Allen

records.descr: Records of prosec. are converted data. See file.

records.addlTxt: Minutes:  15CF513/15CM631.  Clerk/T. Lehman.  ADA Kraus appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in custody w/Atty Hilary Edwards.  Case dismissed & read-in on State's motion per plea agreement w/15CF513.

Minutes:  15CF513/15CM631.  Clerk/T. Lehman.  ADA Kraus appeared for the State.  Deft appeared in custody w/Atty Hilary Edwards.  Cases are resolved.  Court commences plea colliquey w/deft; colliquey interruped - hrg adj to 7/17/15 @ 10am.  Issues raised by court - errors contained the complaint as well as whether a plea can be taken on the battery and the child abuse since there is only one incident of injury to the child.

Attorney James Kraus appeared for the State. Def. appeared (in custody) with Atty. Hilary Edwards. Clerk LE. Case trails 15CF513. Judicial pretrial on 7-16-15 @ 9:50am. Jury selection on 8-24-15 @ 9:00am. Bond continued.

404pm
  Special Prosecutor Attorney Jerrold Hinshaw appeared for the State.  Defendant in custody and appeared in court w/ Attorney Andrea Rufo.  Clerk LE.  Referred to Intake Court for further dispo on 6/11/15 @ 915am.  Plea of Not Guilty entered.  $1000  Signature Bond Set w/conditions (see bond event).

*No Contact w/Jon E A or his residence.  *Not To Discuss Case w/Tanika A S.
